sqlReaderQuery.value:
select  * from [DWH].[W_D_MA_DVCS] where 1=1
AND CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().parameters.ENTITY}' = 'ALL' THEN [MA_DVCS] ELSE '@{pipeline().parameters.ENTITY}' END = [MA_DVCS]
